about.missionTitle: Education In Continuing A Proud Tradition
about.missionDetails: Al Noor Safa Academy wants; To train the country's children in the light of national and Islamic values, work on their important skills and teach them in their mother language.
about.visionTitle: Education Is About Creating Leaders For Tomorrow
about.visionDetails: Al Noor Safa Academy wants to have good people with national and religious pride inside and outside the country so that they can participate in the society in a positive way.
